metadata.synopsis:
Non-critpath. A human adventurer accuses a tiefling child of stealing a necklace from him. A tiefling guard may intervene if things get out of hand. 

Barth: Angry, but gruff and restrained. 
Meli: Fearless, urging Barth on.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Strat the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe denraiddone4. oe rk_startthat will bring you straight to him and the kidNotes: if you need the path where you have the locket you can set "oe rk_getlocket"

54.speaker: Barth
54.text: Only going to ask you one more time, boy. Hand over my locket.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Adventurer and kid look amazd.NodeContext: After a whistle.

83.speaker: Meli
83.text: I don't have your ugly locket. I've never even seen it before!
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Adventurer and kid look amazd.NodeContext: After a whistle.

164.speaker: Barth
164.text: Hand it over or I'll slap the teeth out of your head.
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: Adventurer and kid look amazd.NodeContext: After a whistle.

176.speaker: Player
176.text: Relax. The boy's good, but I'm better - here's your locket.
176.context: CinematicNodeContext: Adventurer and kid look amazd.NodeContext: After a whistle.

98.speaker: Meli
98.text: Not bad. Not even a little bit bad.
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Adventurer and kid look amazd.NodeContext: After a whistle.

64.speaker: Barth
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: To player.NodeContext: Hoarsely, edge of tears.

160.speaker: Barth
160.text: And you! Stay out of my pockets!

133.speaker: Meli
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPT: Sticks his tongue out at the adventurer and runs off.|

150.speaker: Player
150.text: Don't you dare lay a finger on that child.

136.speaker: Player
136.text: Forget it. I don't want any trouble.

122.speaker: Meli
122.text: And I thought he was a coward.
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: |*The adventurer stares down at the defiant child, wavering, fists clenching*|

43.speaker: Player
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: |*The adventurer stares down at the defiant child, wavering, fists clenching*|

121.speaker: Meli
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Barth strikes the child Meli. The child cries out in pain.|

107.speaker: Player
107.text: Knew it. Bloody well knew it.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The amulet drops from Meli's pockets.

118.speaker: Barth
118.text: Knew it. Bloody well knew it.
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Adventurer bends to pick it up

171.speaker: Player
171.text: You like watching people hit kids? You happy now?
171.context: CinematicNodeContext: | A nearby guard notices the kid is in trouble.|

109.speaker: Meli
109.text: You like watching people hit kids? You happy now?
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kid turns to the player, angry.

90.speaker: Meli
90.text: Feel better? Or were you hoping I'd cry?
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: In pain, defiantNodeContext: In pain, defiant

130.speaker: Player
130.text: You like watching people hit kids? You happy now?
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: | A nearby guard notices the kid is in trouble.|

59.speaker: Meli
59.text: You like watching people hit kids? You happy now?
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kid turns to the player, angry.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: You're the one making threats - to a child. Pull yourself together.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Whatever you do to the child, I'll repay ten-fold.
61.context: InternalNodeContext: Should be Paladin tagged when tag is available.

14.speaker: Barth
14.text: You don't understand! The kid stole my locket! He... aw, the hells with this.

167.speaker: Barth
167.text: You don't understand! The kid stole my locket! He... aw, the hells with this.

89.speaker: Barth
89.text: These little devils get away with everything because of coddling bastards like you.

180.speaker: Barth
180.text: You'll get yours some day. I hope I get to see it.

12.speaker: Meli
12.text: Maybe you will. But personally, I doubt it.

119.text: Him, I'll hit once. You won't be so lucky. Get out of the way.

169.speaker: Barth
169.text: Him, I'll hit once. You won't be so lucky. Get out of the way.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Strike the child, go on. See what happens.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Raise a hand to that child and you'll lose it. Your choice.

56.speaker: Meli
56.text: Gods, don't bleed over the thing. It's just tin and glass.

135.speaker: Meli
135.text: Guards! This human is trying to hurt me and my friend!

152.speaker: Player
152.text: Just warning. I've dealt with your type before, human.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: I think it would benefit everyone to calm down here. What happened?

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Theft and revenge have already killed a child here. Calm yourselves - explain what happened.

51.speaker: Barth
51.text: Don't you tell me to calm down - my locket was stolen!

137.speaker: Player
137.text: You better do what he says, boy.

124.speaker: Meli
124.text: I said I don't have it. Maybe he dropped it running away from those big, scary goblins.

162.speaker: Barth
162.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Raising a fist to hit the kid.|

21.speaker: Meli
21.text: Let us find balance. The child will return the locket - and the adult will act his age.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Let us find balance. The child will return the locket - and the adult will act his age.

33.text: I get my locket back and you'll have no trouble from me.

68.speaker: Barth
68.text: I get my locket back and you'll have no trouble from me.

103.speaker: Meli
103.text: You're not fooling anyone, boy. Why'd you take it?

13.speaker: Player
13.text: You're not fooling anyone, boy. Why'd you take it?

26.speaker: Meli
26.text: What kind of question is that? Why does anyone steal anything?

84.speaker: Meli
84.text: What kind of question is that? Why does anyone steal anything?

148.speaker: Meli
148.text: Fine. I have the stupid amulet. Take it.
148.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rummages in his bag, furious.NodeContext: Furious and a little sad.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: I want an answer - why'd you steal it?

132.speaker: Barth
132.text: To impress a girl, most like.

104.speaker: Meli
104.text: It looked like my mother's, all right?

179.speaker: Meli
179.text: Just take the damn thing and leave me alone!
179.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding the amulet back, furious and sad. Wet eyes but not crying.

93.speaker: Barth
93.text: Keep it, kid. You need it more than me.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Cinematic Node: Long beat from Barth. His expression changes from surprise to an understanding sadness.|

47.speaker: Barth
47.text: Keep it, kid. You need it more than me.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Long beat from Barth. His expression changes from surprise to an understanding sadness before he speaks. NodeContext: Long beat. Gruffly. His mother gave him the amulet.

88.speaker: Player
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Cinematic Node: Meli stares up at Barth in shock, then down at his hands. He turns and runs.|NodeContext: Meli stares up at Barth in shock, then down at his hands. He turns and runs.|

190.speaker: Barth
190.context: CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPTING: Stares in direction of kid, then turns to walk away.

46.speaker: Meli
46.text: And I... huh. Someone stole it from me. That's kind of funny.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angrily feeling his pouches, then confusion.

91.speaker: Barth
91.text: Yeah? I'll give you something to laugh about.

100.speaker: Meli
100.text: Help! This human is trying to kill me!

55.speaker: Player
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over locketNodeContext: Hotly, hiding emotion

36.speaker: Meli
36.text: There. Don't know why you cared so much. It's junk.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over locketNodeContext: Hotly, hiding emotion

156.speaker: Barth
156.text: Scram before I give you something to care about.
156.context: CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPTING: Meli steps backNodeContext: Kid runs away at end of node.

112.speaker: Meli
112.text: Huh. Someone stole it from me. That's kind of funny.
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Patting his pockets, not finding the locket, then speaks.

165.text: For the last time, I don't have the stupid thing!

151.speaker: Meli
151.text: For the last time, I don't have the stupid thing!

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Do you really want to take a beating over some jewellery?

115.speaker: Meli
115.text: Probably not. It's just tin and glass.

17.speaker: Meli
17.text: Probably not. It's just tin and glass.

144.speaker: Meli
144.text: Here, take it. Not sure why you care so much about it, honestly.

142.text: A beating, huh? Oh no. Whatever will I do?

41.speaker: Meli
41.text: A beating, huh? Oh no. Whatever will I do?

141.speaker: Player
141.text: Doesn't look like they're coming, boy.
141.context: CinematicNodeContext: | The kid's screaming catches the attention of a nearby guard. |

154.speaker: Player
154.text: Doesn't look like they're coming, boy.
154.context: CinematicNodeContext: | *The kid's screaming goes unnoticed. The kid wavers.* |

117.speaker: Barth
117.text: Doesn't look like they're coming, boy.
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cruel satisfactionNodeContext: Cruel satisfaction

22.speaker: Player
22.text: I tried to give you a chance. You're on your own.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Just give it back, boy. You're better than this.

140.speaker: Meli
140.text: Fine! It's just tin and glass anyway.

99.text: Fine! It's just tin and glass anyway.

31.speaker: Meli
31.text: Fine! It's just tin and glass anyway.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Thieving children wind up dead around here. Do as he says.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Better do what he says, boy. There's already one thief to bury today.

92.speaker: Ikaron
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looks at player and Barth

71.speaker: Player
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looks at player and Barth

102.speaker: Ikaron
102.text: And both of you thought striking the child was a suitable punishment?
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looks at player and Barth

163.speaker: Barth
163.text: If his parents won't do it, I will.

9.speaker: Ikaron
9.text: He's an orphan. How'd you like it if I struck you?

158.speaker: Barth
158.text: You raise a hand to me, it'd better have steel in it.

128.speaker: Player
128.text: Let the boy take it as a warning - he's getting off lightly.

111.text: You're not wrong. I wish you were.

38.speaker: Ikaron
38.text: You're not wrong. I wish you were.

60.speaker: Ikaron
60.text: Child, learn your lesson and be grateful.

34.speaker: Ikaron
34.text: And you, get out of my sight.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: He's a thief. Is it any wonder people think that of us all?

106.speaker: Player
106.text: My coin's on the tiefling. He looks angry.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: No idea. This man just started attacking the boy.

1.speaker: Meli
1.text: These two outsiders are threatening me, Ikaron.

24.speaker: Ikaron
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

86.speaker: Barth
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

129.speaker: Ikaron
129.text: And that justifies threatening a child?
129.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

134.speaker: Player
134.text: There's no locket. This bastard's just throwing his weight around.
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: Nobody's hurting the boy - he's free to leave when he wants.
147.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

120.speaker: Ikaron
120.text: Good. You heard them, child. You're free to go.
120.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

101.speaker: Ikaron
101.text: Good. You heard them, child. You're free to go.
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

80.speaker: Barth
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

66.speaker: Ikaron
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: To Barth, then to Meli.

76.text: We were wrong to trust you. I see that now.
76.context: NodeContext: About to knock someone out.

27.speaker: Ikaron
27.text: We were wrong to trust you. I see that now.
27.context: NodeContext: About to knock someone out.

37.speaker: Ikaron
37.context: NodeContext: About to knock someone out.

125.speaker: Ikaron
125.text: And you? You had this coming.
125.context: NodeContext: About to knock someone out.

28.speaker: Player
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: | Tiefling moves to the adventurer | SCRIPTING: Ikaron steps towards Barth

94.speaker: Player
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: | Tiefling knocks out the adventurer with a big punch |

77.speaker: Player
77.text: Just a misunderstanding. The boy was about to give Barth his locket back.

85.text: You're lying. I see it in your face.

178.speaker: Ikaron
178.text: You're lying. I see it in your face.

146.speaker: Player
146.text: I like meddlers - they make funny noises when I smash them. Are you a meddler?

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Meddlers are even worse than thieves. You're not meddling, are you?

183.speaker: Ikaron
183.text: Child, you promised to stop stealing. You disgrace us all. Give it back.

157.text: And now you're threatening me? You fool.

45.speaker: Ikaron
45.text: And now you're threatening me? You fool.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I'm the one looking out for the boy.

159.speaker: Meli
159.text: These two outsiders are threatening me, Ikaron. Even tails over there!
